ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] What's better?
ygData.msgSnippet: Have to agree -- until you start a serious charming career, go with strength.  It is probably most important at lower lvls too because you wear heavier armor
ygData.messageBody:
Have to agree -- until you start a serious charming career, go with strength. It is probably most important at lower lvls too because you wear heavier armor then.
Stephen McCloskey <s.mccloskey@...> wrote: imho at level 11 it doesn't matter much. If you need more STR then go with
that, else use the CHA. At 11 I was always looking for STR as I was
wearing all bronze and heavy weapons. I didn't start trading in my STR for
CHA until I was getting lighter gear.

-Steve

>Just got my lvl 11 bard a silver cats eye necklace insanely cheap (a few
>cats eye agates and 3pp for it), then realized I already had a 3str item
>in that slot... So what's better, 3 str or 3 cha?
>
>
>--
>~Umi-chan
